nav.div: Schulenburg ISD » News » Schulenburg ISD - COVID-19 Updates

div.span:
This page is dedicated to all of the updates SISD will be posting regarding the COVID-19 pandemic.
Visit the Region 13 website listed for more information on the COVID-19. https://www4.esc13.net/school-health
Please refer to this page for up-to-date information, as it is released by the district.
SSO (single sign-on) Website: launchpad.classlink.com/sisd1
SISD School Meal Plan During COVID-19 Closure
SISD School Meal Plan During COVID-19 Closure (Spanish)

p.span:
The governor has issued an executive order stating that all Texas schools will remain closed through the end of the 2019 - 2020 school year. All school activities have been cancelled for the remainder of the school year. We are waiting on guidance from the Commissioner of Education regarding graduation. Please monitor for updates on the school website, radio, newspaper and social media.
Click here for more information.

El gobernador emitió una orden ejecutiva que establece que todas las escuelas de Texas permanecerán cerradas hasta el final del año escolar 2019-2020. Todas las actividades escolares han sido canceladas por el resto del año escolar. Estamos esperando la guía del Comisionado de Educación con respecto a la graduación. Esté atento a las actualizaciones en el sitio web de la escuela, la radio, el periódico y las redes sociales.
